content: crochet the romantic wildrose shoulder bag that is composed of 15 granny squares that are seamed together in a special way this lovely bag has an effortlessly chic vibe as it holds all your essentials and can be worn on one shoulder or across the body a variety of crochet stitches using strong and sturdy mercerized cotton makes this design a very fun project the **free pattern** has been divided into 2 parts * **part 1** going through the granny squares assembly and seaming can be found *** here 1 *** * **part 2** going through the top edging and strap can be found *** here 2 *** the pdf for purchase is 13 pages and includes the pattern and full step-by-step photo tutorial *gauge* granny square 4 10 cm x 4 10 cm diagonal is 5 12 7 cm if you would like to make the bag bigger you can increase the size of the granny squares instructions are included in the pattern showing how to add more rounds you can find a full video tutorial that demonstrates how to crochet the **wildrose granny square** in the pattern *** here 3 *** of course you are welcome to use your favorite granny square pattern and follow my instructions for assembly seaming top edging and strap to create your own bags as well note that i used 187 g/348 yds 2 skeins to crochet my bag if you plan on making the strap longer making the squares bigger adding a pocket or generally crochet more loosely i would recommend getting 3 skeins to be safe if you love making granny square bags check out the other bags in my wildrose collection the **wildrose market bag** 4 composed of 13 granny squares and the ** wildrose backpack 5 ** 1 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-wildrose-shoulder-bag-part-1/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-wildrose-shoulder-bag-part-2/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-wildrose-shoulder-bag-part-1/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-wildrose-market-bag/ 5 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-the-wildrose-backpack/
